page.title: 13LAW & ORDER
page.content: In Clifton, we have a police house where a{policeman}lives. He is not really the village policeman because he is often on duty in other places like Stourport. Our policeman is kind and happy and is also the group scout master. his duty in our village is shared with the Martley and Great Witley policeman. The police check the childrens'{cycles}and make sure that we play in safe places. We do not have much{theft}in the area although our school computer was stolen last year. There has been trouble with{poachers near the Shelsleys and also some cases of{dogs killing lambs.}The worst {accidents}happen on Clifton Hill when cars go too fast or skid on the ice in winter. There is a{speed limit}of 30 mph in Clifton and there is a problem with cars{parking}on the main street. {by Steven Bethell age 11
